long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get real-time weather forecasts every time you launch your new browser tab. This extension will give you a 5-day forecast for your location in a streamlined new tab page. This extension also includes a web search feature powered by Yahoo!

Permissions requested by this extension:  Location. This is requested to provide you with an accurate weather forecast for your current location. 

Privacy Policy: https://newtabweather.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of use: https://newtabweather.com/terms-of-service/
Contact: https://newtabweather.com/contact/
Uninstall Info: https://newtabweather.com/uninstall/
